paragraph_location.text: Dr. Joanna Bisgrove, a Family Medicine physician based in Wisconsin, is not letting the COVID-19 pandemic get in the way of her advocacy work. As the Wisconsin Co-chair of Doctors for Biden, she has advocated on behalf of the Affordable Care Act. Thank you, Dr. Bisgrove, for standing up for your patients, your community, and science.

In late November, Dr. Abraham joined Inside the Issues with Alex Cohen to discuss the most recent wave of COVID-19 cases and precautions patients can take to keep their communities safe. Earlier this month, Dr. Lesko discussed with Newsy the COVID-19 vaccine roll out to the general public; and on the heels of Pfizerâ€™s vaccine authorization, Dr. Edje stopped by TMZ to share her unique experiences as a Black woman and physician participating in a COVID-19 vaccine trial.
